ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: I think you misinterpreted Kaearia (John Kim s) position.  He stated he did not think Verant was maliciously screwing over bards.  Instead, he thinks that they
ygData.messageBody:
I think you misinterpreted Kaearia (John Kim's) position. He stated he did not think Verant was maliciously screwing over bards. Instead, he thinks that they are a bunch of idiots who have no idea what they are doing in regards to bards. So he is no longer going to worry about trying to use logic, statistical analysis, etc. to fight for improvements to the bard class since they don't have a clue what they are doing. Thats the way I interpreted his post.

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 11, 2000 10:08 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of


no, that's not me. of course kaearia posted on the concert hall that he doesn't
have a lot of problems with the way verant is handling the issues either, at least
with regard to gordon's monster post.
